#Importazione dataset:
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(explore)
library(dplyr) 

# Get the Data
colony <- read.csv("../data/colony.csv")
stressor <- read.csv("../data/stressor.csv")

new_stress <- stressor %>% tidyr::pivot_wider(
  names_from = stressor, 
  values_from = stress_pct,
  values_fill = 0
)

# Merge data frames together
data <- inner_join(colony, new_stress, by = c("year","months","state"))
```

```{r}
explore(data)
```

```{r}
data [is.na(data)] <- 0
new_stress [is.na(new_stress)] <- 0
data_plot <-dplyr::select(new_stress,-state)
ggpairs(data_plot) + theme_bw()
```
